p: The scaled wind tunnel is the core of the experiment, and its function is to contain the sand when it is moved by the air fan, orienting it towards the ABs. It was designed in the form of a quadrangular prism resting on one of its lateral faces, and was uncovered both by the upper lateral face and by the two bases, as can be seen in Figure 4a,b. It was made of medium-density fiberboard (MDF).
